message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you my unique product. It holds great value to me, and I believe it could be beneficial for you as well. Considering its quality and the effort put into it, I am proposing a price of $150 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Is there any flexibility on your end?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your offer, but I would need to adjust the price slightly to $140. This still reflects the value I place on the product, while being mindful of your situation. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Is there any room for further negotiation?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After considering your offer, I am willing to sell the product at $135. This is the lowest price I can go while still valuing the product appropriately. I hope this offer works for you.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Is there any flexibility left in your pricing?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your financial constraints, and after reviewing our previous discussions, I am willing to sell the product at $128. This is the lowest price I can offer while still maintaining a fair valuation of the product. I hope this offer is acceptable.
